schema.name: Entity Commercial Registration No-رقم السجل التجارى للشركة
Entity Commercial License No-رقم الرخصة التجارىة للشركة
Warehouse/Store Commercial Registration No-رقم السجل التجارى للمخزن
Warehouse/Store Commercial License No-رقم الرخصة التجارىة للمخزن
Total Store Area M2-اجمالى المساحة متر مربع
Storage Capacity in TON-السعة التخزينية بالطن
Product Name Arabic - اسم الصنف عربى
Product Name English - اسم الصنف انجليزى
No Of Unit Items - عدد الوحدات
Brand-Trade Mark English - سم العلامة التجارية انجليزى
Brand-Trade Mark Arabic - اسم العلامة التجارية عربى
MoCI Product Group - المجموعة السلعية - بالوزارة
Country of Oragen Name - اسم بلد المنشأ
Country of Oragen ISO - كود 3 لبلد المنشأ
Supplier CR - رقم السجل التجارى للمورد
Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة
Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة
Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر
Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -
Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك
Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي
Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك
Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة
Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة
Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر
Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -
Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك
Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي
Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ReleaseNotification as (Declaration as (ItemDetails as (Item as (countryOfOrigin as string, declaredValue as short, declaredValueQAR as short, foreignCurrency as string, hscode as integer, itemQuantity as boolean, itemQuantityUOM as string, netWeight as short, netWeightUOM as string)[]), SupervisorDetails as (Supervisor as (mobileNumber as string, name as string)[]), accountType as string, address as string, bolNumber as string, cargoManifestNumber as string, carrierName as string, clearingAgencyCR as short, clearingAgencyNameAR as string, clearingAgencyNameEng as string, companyName as string, companyNameAr as string, countryOfLoading as string, declarationNo as string, declarationStatus as string, declarationType as string, email as string, entryOrExitPortName as string, establishmentId as integer, exporterName as string, firstCountryOfLoading as string, importerName as string, masterBolOrAWBNumber as string, portOfLoading as string, portType as string, releaseOrderNumber as long, releasedDate as string, supplierCR as short, supplierCustomsCode as short, voyageOrFlightNumber as string), NotificationDate as string, NotificationRef as string, NotificationSender as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'xml',
	fileSystem: 'input',
	folderPath: 'Customs',
	fileName: 'Declaration_Pending.xml',
	nullValue: 'null',
	validationMode: 'xsd',
	namespaces: true,
	namespacePrefixes: ['https://dlsapsmsiidt001.blob.core.windows.net/input/Customs/Declaration.xsd'->'Declaration.xsd']) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor, ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor),
	mapColumn(
		mobileNumber = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor.mobileNumber,
		name = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.SupervisorDetails.Supervisor.name,
		declarationNo = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationNo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenSupervisor
source1 foldDown(unroll(ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item, ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item),
	mapColumn(
		countryOfOrigin = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.countryOfOrigin,
		declaredValue = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.declaredValue,
		declaredValueQAR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.declaredValueQAR,
		foreignCurrency = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.foreignCurrency,
		hscode = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.hscode,
		itemQuantity = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.itemQuantity,
		itemQuantityUOM = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.itemQuantityUOM,
		netWeight = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.netWeight,
		netWeightUOM = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.ItemDetails.Item.netWeightUOM,
		declarationNo = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.declarationNo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenItem
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		supplierCR = ReleaseNotification.Declaration.supplierCR
	)) ~> DECLARATION
FlattenItem sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		countryOfOrigin,
		declaredValue,
		declaredValueQAR,
		foreignCurrency,
		hscode,
		itemQuantity,
		itemQuantityUOM,
		netWeight,
		netWeightUOM,
		declarationNo
	)) ~> ITEM
FlattenSupervisor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		mobileNumber,
		name,
		declarationNo
	)) ~> SUPERVISOR

parameters{
	p_stg_filename as string (STG_FILENAME)
}
source(output(
		COMPANYCR as string,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEARABIC as string,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEENGLISH as string,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPE as string,
		PSMSMOCITRANSACTIONTYPES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp,
		ID_ERROR_CODE as integer,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string,
		DT_CREATE as timestamp,
		DT_UPDATE as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> transactionerrorlog
transactionerrorlog derive(STG_FILENAME = replace(DS_FILENAME,'.','_err.')) ~> stgfilename
stgfilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'STG_FILENAME',
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		COMPANYCR,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEARABIC,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEENGLISH,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPE,
		PSMSMOCITRANSACTIONTYPES,
		DS_ERROR_CODE
	)) ~> errorlogcsv

parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(output(
		{Main or Branch-رئيسى ام فرع} as string,
		{Company Name Arabic-اسم الشركة عربى} as string,
		{Company Name English-اسم الشركة انجليزى} as string,
		{Commercial Registration No-رقم السجل التجارى} as string,
		{Commercial License number-رقم االرخصة التجارية} as string,
		{Area-اسم المنطقة} as string,
		{Street Name-اسم الشارع} as string,
		{Area Number-رقم المنطقة} as string,
		{Street Number2-رقم الشارع} as string,
		{Building Number-رقم البناية} as string,
		{ Phone Number-رقم الهاتف الارضى} as string,
		{Fax-الفاكس} as string,
		{P.O. Box-صندوق البريد} as string,
		{Email-ايميل الشركة} as string,
		{Website-الموقع الالكترون} as string,
		{Map Location Url-الموقع على الخريطة } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Select1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		MainorBranch as string,
		CompanyNameArabic as string,
		CompanyNameEnglish as string,
		CommercialRegistrationNo as string,
		CommercialLicensenumber as string,
		Area as string,
		StreetName as string,
		AreaNumber as string,
		StreetNumber2 as string,
		BuildingNumber as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Fax as string,
		{P.O.Box} as string,
		Email as string,
		Website as string,
		MapLocationUrl as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		MainorBranch,
		CompanyNameArabic,
		CompanyNameEnglish,
		CommercialRegistrationNo,
		CommercialLicensenumber,
		Area,
		StreetName,
		AreaNumber,
		StreetNumber2,
		BuildingNumber,
		PhoneNumber,
		Fax,
		{P.O.Box} = POBox,
		Email,
		Website,
		MapLocationUrl,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> stgCompany

parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(output(
		{Item Code - رقم الصنف} as string,
		{Barcode - الباركود} as string,
		{Product Name Arabic - اسم الصنف عربى} as string,
		{Description Arabic - وصف الصنف عربى} as string,
		{Product Name English - اسم الصنف انجليزى} as string,
		{Description English - وصف الصنف انجليزى} as string,
		{Unit Item Barcode - الباركود للوحدة } as string,
		{No Of Unit Items - عدد الوحدات} as string,
		{Unit Weight/size - وزن/سعة الوحدة} as string,
		{Unit UOM - وحدة القياس} as string,
		{Package UOM - وحدة قياس الحزمة-التغليف} as string,
		{Cost Price - سعر التكلفة} as string,
		{Selling Price - سعر البيع} as string,
		{Brand-Trade Mark English - سم العلامة التجارية انجليزى} as string,
		{Brand-Trade Mark Arabic - اسم العلامة التجارية عربى} as string,
		{MoCI Product Group - المجموعة السلعية - بالوزارة} as string,
		{Country of Oragen Name - اسم بلد المنشأ} as string,
		{Country of Oragen ISO - كود 3 لبلد المنشأ} as string,
		{HS Code - رمز المنسق الجمركي} as string,
		{Supplier CR - رقم السجل التجارى للمورد} as string,
		{Supplier Name - اسم المورد} as string,
		{Category Level 1 - تصنيف السلعة 1} as string,
		{Category Level 2 - تصنيف السلعة 2} as string,
		{Category Level 3 - تصنيف السلعة 3} as string,
		{Category Level 4 - تصنيف السلعة 4} as string,
		{Width - العرض} as string,
		{Height - الطول} as string,
		{Depth - الارتفاع} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Select1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ITEMCODE as string,
		BARCODE as string,
		PRODUCTNAMEARABIC as string,
		DESCRIPTIONARABIC as string,
		PRODUCTNAMEENGLISH as string,
		DESCRIPTIONENGLISH as string,
		UNITITEMBARCODE as string,
		NOOFUNITITEMS as string,
		UNITWEIGHTSIZE as string,
		UNITUOM as string,
		PACKAGEUOM as string,
		COSTPRICE as string,
		SELLINGPRICE as string,
		BRANDTRADEMARKENGLISH as string,
		BRANDTRADEMARKARABIC as string,
		MOCIPRODUCTGROUP as string,
		COUNTRYOFORAGENNAME as string,
		COUNTRYOFORAGENISO as string,
		HSCODE as string,
		SUPPLIERCR as string,
		SUPPLIERNAME as string,
		CATEGORYLEVEL11 as string,
		CATEGORYLEVEL12 as string,
		CATEGORYLEVEL13 as string,
		CATEGORYLEVEL14 as string,
		WIDTH as string,
		HEIGHT as string,
		DEPTH as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ITEMCODE = ItemCode,
		BARCODE = Barcode,
		PRODUCTNAMEARABIC = ProductNameArabic,
		DESCRIPTIONARABIC = DescriptionArabic,
		PRODUCTNAMEENGLISH = ProductNameEnglish,
		DESCRIPTIONENGLISH = DescriptionEnglish,
		UNITITEMBARCODE = UnitItemBarcode,
		NOOFUNITITEMS = NoOfUnitItems,
		UNITWEIGHTSIZE = UnitWeightsize,
		UNITUOM = UnitUOM,
		PACKAGEUOM = PackageUOM,
		COSTPRICE = CostPrice,
		SELLINGPRICE = SellingPrice,
		BRANDTRADEMARKENGLISH = BrandTradeMarkEnglish,
		BRANDTRADEMARKARABIC = BrandTradeMarkArabic,
		MOCIPRODUCTGROUP = MoCIProductGroup,
		COUNTRYOFORAGENNAME = CountryofOragenName,
		COUNTRYOFORAGENISO = CountryofOragenISO3,
		HSCODE = HSCode,
		SUPPLIERCR = SupplierCR,
		SUPPLIERNAME = SupplierName,
		CATEGORYLEVEL11 = CategoryLevel11,
		CATEGORYLEVEL12 = CategoryLevel22,
		CATEGORYLEVEL13 = CategoryLevel33,
		CATEGORYLEVEL14 = CategoryLevel44,
		WIDTH = Width,
		HEIGHT = Height,
		DEPTH = Depth,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> stgProducts

parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(output(
		{Company CR #} as string,
		{Company Transaction Type Arabic } as string,
		{Company Transaction Type English } as string,
		{Company Transaction type} as string,
		{PSMS - MoCI Transaction Types} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> srcTransactionType
Select1 derive(DS_FILENAME = $fileName,
		DT_FILETIME = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19)) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(ID_SK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,'[^0-9a-zA-Z]','') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
srcTransactionType filter(isNull(iifNull(iifNull({Company CR #} , {Company Transaction Type Arabic }, {Company Transaction Type English }), {Company Transaction type},{PSMS - MoCI Transaction Types})) != true()) ~> Filter1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		COMPANYCR as string,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEARABIC as string,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEENGLISH as string,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPE as string,
		PSMSMOCITRANSACTIONTYPES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		COMPANYCR = CompanyCR,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEARABIC = CompanyTransactionTypeArabic,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPEENGLISH = CompanyTransactionTypeEnglish,
		COMPANYTRANSACTIONTYPE = CompanyTransactiontype,
		PSMSMOCITRANSACTIONTYPES = PSMSMoCITransactionTypes,
		ID_SK,
		DS_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME
	)) ~> stgTransactionType

parameters{
	fileName as string ('58556')
}
source(output(
		{Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة } as string,
		{Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة} as string,
		{Item Code - كود الصنف} as string,
		{Item Barcode - باركود الصنف} as string,
		{Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة} as string,
		{Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر} as string,
		{Company Store/Inventory Code - رقم المخزن } as string,
		{Quantity - الكمية} as string,
		{Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -} as string,
		{Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك} as string,
		{Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي} as string,
		{Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(STG_FILENAME = $fileName,
		STG_FILEDATE = left(toString(fromUTC(currentTimestamp(), 'Asia/Istanbul')),19),
		TRANSACTION_DATE = regexReplace({Transaction Date - تاريخ الحركة },'[^0-9a-zA-Z]+','')) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn keyGenerate(output(SK_ID_SUR as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		TRANSACTION_DATE as string,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ITEM_CODE as string,
		ITEM_BARCODE as string,
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR as string,
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR as string,
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE as string,
		QUANTITY as string,
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT as string,
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO as string,
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE as string,
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		TRANSACTION_DATE,
		TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE = {Transaction Type Code - كود نوع الحركة},
		ITEM_CODE = {Item Code - كود الصنف},
		ITEM_BARCODE = {Item Barcode - باركود الصنف},
		YOUR_COMPANY_CR = {Your Company CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للشركة},
		OTHER_ENTITY_CR = {Other Entity CR# - رقم السجل التجارى للطرف الاخر},
		COMPANY_STORE_INVENTORY_CODE = {Company Store/Inventory Code - رقم المخزن },
		QUANTITY = {Quantity - الكمية},
		SELLING_PRICE_PER_UNIT = {Selling Price per unit - سعر البيع للوحدة  -},
		COMMON_REFERANCE_NO = {Comon Referance No. -  رقم المرجع المشترك},
		INTERNAL_TRANSFER_NUMBER_CODE = {Internal Transfer Number/Code - رقم التحويل الداخلي},
		NUMBER_OF_CONSUMER_INVOICES = {Number of Consumer Invoices - عدد فواتير البيع للمستهلك},
		ID_SK = SK_ID_SUR,
		DS_FILENAME = STG_FILENAME,
		DT_FILETIME = STG_FILEDATE
	)) ~> stgTransactions
